title: Picking the Tour de France Podium: Who Can Rip Up the ‘Big 4’ Script?
content:
Velo's editorial crew debate their hot takes and wild guesses at the Tour's top-3 - and no, it's not all about Pogačar, Vingegaard, Roglič, Evenepoel.

Read the full article at Picking the Tour de France Podium: Who Can Rip Up the ‘Big 4’ Script? on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
